scripts.postinstall: npm run install:wordpress && npm run install:bower && npm run install:composer
scripts.install:wordpress: sh -c "([ ! -e public ] && curl -sS https://wordpress.org/latest.zip > wordpress.zip && extract-zip wordpress.zip public-tmp && mv public-tmp/wordpress public && rm -r public-tmp) || true"
scripts.install:composer: php composer.phar install || (curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php && php composer.phar install)
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:js && npm run build:less
scripts.build:js: node node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o BaseUrl=src/js/ name=../bower_components/requirejs/require include=requirejs-config,bootstrap paths.wp-inlcudes=../../public/wp-includes/js insertRequire=bootstrap mainConfigFile=src/js/requirejs-config.js out=src/js/main-build.js
